title: The Grandmaster of Kung Fu
overview: A hero of government affairs, protect the world!  At the end of Qing Dynasty. Japan, which is trying to seize Tianjin, where even great powers cannot easily enter, and further devour China, opens the Honghua Military Academy in Tianjin and suppresses the Tianjin Martial Arts Association. Huo Yuan Jia, an expert in the field, engages in a life-threatening battle with Kamesaburo Takeda, a Japanese military commander in order to prevent Japan's ambitions.
